adviseScripts.text: Why are all these Commanders
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: so incompetent?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: They're the result of ineffectual Military Academies.
It seems that way because you're in a different league entirely.
... Tsk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: You're always putting the blame on someone or something else.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: That's why you're all so inferior.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Comparatively speaking, I suppose you're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: But I don't think that's the whole story.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I was able to understand Eunhwa better through our chat.
Vesti has potential.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Yet, she ignores my orders and her zeal for battle can cause her to lose control.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I need a way to bring Vesti to her senses. To humble her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Read Vesti's personal diary out loud in a meeting.
Just be patient with her.
... Talk about ruthless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text:
With this approach, only two results are possible:
Total success, or disastrous failure.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Let's try it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ... You absolute fool.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I didn't come here for brainless, feel-good advice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa's reactions helped me understand her better.
Emma keeps trying to get me and Vesti to spend time together.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I don't know how to refuse.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Why not just be friendly with Vesti?
Use work as an excuse.
Worthless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Why would I want to get involved with that monster outside of a mission?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: That's what I've been doing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: However, that excuse won't hold up forever. Hmph...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I was able to understand Eunhwa's relationship with others better.
When do you think we'll be able to reclaim
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: the surface world?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Within my lifetime.
Right now, it's not looking promising.
... I admire your confidence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I suppose it's better than nothing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Oh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: So when the going gets tough you just give up, is that it? I can't believe you...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Eunhwa.
You know...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Emma has been giving me all these massages lately. She says it's for stress relief.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I... I'm not quite sure how to process it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Enjoy it while you can.
If you don't like it, turn her down politely.
... What?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Are you... the same as Emma?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I can't refuse Emma.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'm not the only one, either. No one can say no to her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I was able to understand Eunhwa's relationships with others better.
Nope. Not today. Keep  your mouth shut.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I don't feel like talking to a fool like you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: What's gotten into you?
Did you run into Rapi on the way here?
Nothing, I just ran into some riffraff on the way over.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Looks like I'm not done dealing with riffraff today, either...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ... I ought to punch you in the face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: How dare you speak her name in front of me?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: We spend some time in awkward silence.
Absolute or Matis?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Which squad is the strongest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Everyone's been talking about it. Tell me, what are your thoughts?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Absolute, of course.
It's hard to beat Matis' technology.
Of course you would say that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: But, you might actually not be as stupid as you look.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Pssh, do you really think strength is determined by technology alone?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: The important thing is how you use that technology.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: When it comes to that, you all get a big fat zero. Goose egg. It's no wonder your perspective is so distorted.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Eunhwa about the concept of strength.
There is no weather in the Ark.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I find this somewhat depressing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: If it's weather you want, we can just go up to the surface for a minute.
We'll enjoy all four seasons once we reclaim the surface.
... Have you completely lost your little mind?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text:
The surface is a war zone.
You could get blown to smithereens by a laser beam in the blink of an eye.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text:
Now you're saying you want to go up just to enjoy the weather?
The depths of your stupidity continue to astound me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Now, that's quite a coincidence.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I was thinking the exact same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I have a meaningful conversation with Eunhwa.
What should we do with the defectives on the team
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: who aren't pulling their weight?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Discover their talents and play to their strengths.
Have more capable team members help them out.
Right. While our best option would simply be to replace them,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: we often have no choice but to keep them on the team.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: In this situation, your suggestion is reasonable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Tell me. Do you even have a brain between those ears of yours?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: The entire team must operate on the same wavelength.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: We can't change our strategy just to babysit children who couldn't even wipe their own butts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Eunhwa about team organization.
Tell me. How do you define comradery?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: It's an unbreakable sense of trust. You can entrust the other person with anything.
It's a sense of loyalty that lasts forever.
Oh? That means nothing to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: The only person I can rely on is myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: The moment I put too much trust in someone else, I could lose everything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ... That's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: No matter what happens, it means nothing if you have no one by your side at the end of it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I talk with Eunhwa about the meaning of comradery.
I'm not in a talking mood today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'd prefer to rest.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Is something on your mind?
You hear that? Silence. I love it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Would you shut up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I can't relax with you constantly badgering in my ear.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: So please, if you'd be so kind... shut it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I spend some time together in silence.
What's your stance on mistakes?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Everyone makes them.
Even the smallest mistake could spell disaster.
I don't disagree,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: but I'd rather not have someone like that around me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Exactly right. Most people would prattle on how everyone makes mistakes, but
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: there are some situations where you simply can't afford to take any missteps.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I can't believe I'm saying this...but we actually agree on something.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I have a conversation about times when there's no room for error.
Eat it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ...　Did Emma make this?
No.
You're not as stupid as you look.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: She asked me to make sure you ate every last bit of it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: So dig in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'm not asking. I'm telling you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eat it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I have a "delicious" meal with Eunhwa.
The Outpost wouldn't be too bad if it weren't for all the mouthbreathers stumbling about.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: What's the one location here you couldn't do without?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: The armory.
The Toy Store.
A fine answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Considering that's where all the weapons and supplies are stored, it's a very important place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Make sure you keep everything in good order.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: What can I even say to such a ridiculous response?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: How much longer do you intend on disappointing me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I talked about various other locations in the Outpost.
If you encountered heavy enemy resistance en route to your target location,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: what would you do?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'd pull back before they noticed me, and report it to my superiors.
Once you've encountered the enemy, you must engage. I would fight until the very end.
Very wise. It is best to retreat
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: when you're outmanned and outgunned.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: More than a few Commanders have paid for such bravado with their life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'm disappointed to hear you harbor the same foolish thoughts.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I debated on which tactics work best up on the surface.
It's utterly puerile, but people often form attachments to the most useless things.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Please don't tell me you feel that way about anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'm incredibly attached to this doll that I cuddle up with when I sleep.
My identification badge.
... I can't even begin to understand that. Is it because...
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: No. I don't even want to understand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: That's far from useless.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: It's an important document that differentiates commanders from ordinary civilians.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: You must take good care of it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: During our conversation, Eunhwa and I talked about all sorts of various items.
My mind feels so cluttered.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I need to find a way to clear my head.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Take some alone time and organize your thoughts.
Distract yourself by doing various tasks.
The entire reason I'm in this mess is that I can't handle it on my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ... I shouldn't have said anything.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Thanks to you, my mind is even more of a disaster zone now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: That's a good idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: When we're done here, I want you to go to the training room with me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Eunhwa about emptying your mind.
After a few days of rations for breakfast, lunch, and dinner...it can be rough going.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: You don't have anything else to eat by any chance, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Hand over the apple from the surface that you have been saving.
Hand her some apple-flavored Splendamin
It looked like it pained you to give this to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: You must have paid an arm and a leg for it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: ... Thank you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Thanks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I talked more about food.
Commanders look after the mental well-being of their Nikkes,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: but does anybody pay attention to your state of mind?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Commanders are on their own in that regard.
I don't really need anyone's help anyway. I feel fine.
I'm sure I don't have to tell you this,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: but if you end up having a mental breakdown, then that's all she wrote.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Just don't act like a weakling and keep doing what you're doing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Don't be ridiculous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: if you end up having a mental breakdown, then that's all she wrote.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: When are you going to wise up?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Eunhwa and I have a conversation about one's mental wellbeing.
Hey, out of the new bunch of recruits,
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: is there any worth a damn?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: Not a single one.
Three or four of them caught my eye.
Are you sure about that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I saw one or two that could crack a few Rapture skulls.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: You don't have an eye for this at all.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: From now on, I'll just handle it myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'm pretty sure I agree with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'll let you take it from here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I'll make a list and send it your way, so keep an eye out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Eunhwa

adviseScripts.text: I spend some time with Eunhwa selecting the new Nikke recruits.
